name: Crooked Killer
description:
After you had been murdered by thugs, having your bones broken and neck snapped, you return to life possessed by a demonic force that commands you to kill. Take out your revenge on some low-life thugs before you lose all of your blood. Get the highest amount of kills possible without dying, and take out your revenge. 

Controls:

RDG - Movement (Forward, Left, Right)

Left Shift - Sprint

Right Mouse Click - Shoot

Q - Empty Mag

W - Reload Mag

Credits:

Leo Laughlin

Kelly Stragalas

Songs:

PhaZed & Azkaban - Spartan Odyssey

AMARTEX - Fantasia

HCD:

High Concept Document - https://adjoining-stocking-f63.notion.site/PROTOTYPE-2-Crooked-Killer-25772b8442...
